metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9036 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function ReadNextFunctionHandle() in mat5.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio4 - 1.5.13-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
